detaileddescription.para: cache_content_open: opens the local fd on the cache.
Opens the fd on the FSAL

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be accessed.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] flags to be used to open the file

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry_dir, fsal_name_t *pname, cache_entry_t *pentry_file, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_openflags_t openflags, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_open_by_name

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_open: opens the local fd on the cache.
Opens the fd on the FSAL

parameterdescription.para: [IN] name of the file to be opened in the parent directory
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] flags to be used to open the file

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_close: closes the local fd in the FSAL.
Closes the local fd in the FSAL.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be accessed.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.

briefdescription.para: Removes an entry of any type.
